personalityTraits: I don't run from evil. Evil runs from me.
I don't talk about the thing that torments
me. I'd rather not burden others with my
ideals: I kill monsters to make the world a safer
place, and to exorcise my own demons.
bonds: There’s evil in me, contained by my patron.
He and I will work together to create
flaws: The killers took away the only person that
loved me. I desperately search for others
features: Fighting Style: Archery, +2 to hit with ranged
Second Wind: Bonus, +1d10+lvl HP, 1/SR
========== CELESTIAL WARLOCK ========
Pact Magic with Solar of Haphaestos
Healing Light: Bon.Act.,(W.Lvl+1)d6/LR, 60'
Piety: 2
========== CROSSBOW EXPERT ==========
You ignore the loading quality of crossbows
Being within 5' doesn’t impose disadvantage
When you attack with a one handed weapon, you
can use a bonus action to attack with a hand
crossbow
Constructed Resilience:
Adv vs poison, Resistance to poison
You don’t need to eat, drink, or breathe.
You are immune to disease.
Don't need sleep, magic can't put to sleep.
Sentry's Rest. When you take a long rest, you must
spend at least six hours in an inactive, motionless
state, rather than sleeping. In this state, you appear
inert, but it doesn’t render you unconscious, and
you can see and hear as normal.
Integrated Protection: +1 bonus to Armor Class.
backstory: I was made by a lone genius, who I knew only as 'Doc'.  Doc had almost finished me - he had only a a small amount of tinkering left to do. I was getting my
last update when mercenaries broke into the workshop, killed my creator. They stole all his notes and materials. They also
picked up the last part of me that he was working on, which woke me up.
The mercenaries fled when I arose from the workbench, taking everything with them.  I tracked them down one by one, torturing
them for information before killing them and moving on to the next one. Eventually I found the one that had stolen
my missing piece.  After killing him, I installed the last part - a conscience.
I was immediately crushed with guilt and remorse for my evil deeds, and they haunt me to this day. I wander the land,
seeking redemption for my actions, and looking for someone who will accept me the way Doc did.
Upon reaching 2nd level, I received a visitation from a Solar of Haphaestos, who offered to trade knowledge of how to make more
of my kind, in exchange for service.
allies: Hunt down rabid moose for Nimsy the Lonelywood
Hunt down Seffick Caltro (Torga Icevane's 2IC) for
Get Master's notes back (Torga stole them)
treasure: Portable hole, to set up a workshop. Fold it for easy escape.

bagMiddlePouch: A sign that says 'World's largest dancing
A loop of string, attached to the sign
bagMainPouch: A music box that plays whenever its holder dances
